mapper.insert: insert into user_tb(user_id, email, nickname, oauth2_id, provider, role) values(0, #{email}, #{nickname}, #{oauth2Id}, #{provider}, "ROLE_USER")
mapper.update: update user_tb set role = "ROLE_ADMIN" where user_id = #{userId}
mapper.select: select ut.user_id, ut.email, ut.nickname, ut.oauth2_id, ut.provider, ut.role from user_tb ut where ut.email = #{email}
select user_id, email, nickname, oauth2_id, provider, role from user_tb where oauth2_id = #{oauth2Id}
